C1 [ T often passive ] to cause someone to behave in a particular way: Like so many people, he's motivated by greed. He is genuinely motivated by a desire to help people.
C1 [ T ] to make someone want to do something well: [ + to infinitive ] Teaching is all about motivating people to learn.
